mapper.select: select target_formula from target_management where id in(select target_id from report_template_tags where template_sheet_id = #{sheetId} ORDER BY sequence)

SELECT t.written_name, t.unit, t.target_formula, t2.decimal_scale FROM target_management t inner JOIN report_template_tags t2 on t2.target_id = t.id WHERE t.id IN ( SELECT target_id FROM report_template_tags WHERE template_sheet_id = #{sheetId} ORDER BY sequence )

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT A.target_name,m.target_formula, A.tag_time_suffix,A.tag_cal_suffix,A.decimal_scale , m.`code` FROM (SELECT i.target_name, t.tag_time_suffix, t.tag_cal_suffix, t.decimal_scale FROM report_template_tags t INNER JOIN target_management_index i ON t.parent_id = i.id WHERE t.template_sheet_id in ( SELECT id FROM report_template_sheet WHERE template_config_id = 52) ) A INNER JOIN target_management m on A.target_name=m.target_name) B WHERE B.`code` LIKE #{code}
